Articles.Content:
In light of recently implemented additional Kerbal hairstyles, (and my recent replaying of XCOM 2), I would like to be able to create, customise, and name my own Kerbals. I want to insert my friends and family into the game and watch them go on space adventures and/or explode.

I hope such a feature is considered for a (reasonably far) future update. I can see it being particularly fun in multiplayer.
